items.title: What is the meaning of Lesy?
Step 1: Create config file in the project root
Step 2: Get the config in command or middleware
Step 1: Use it in command or middleware
Step 3: Run command to generate files

node.descriptionHTML:
1.0.0-beta.6 (2020-08-19)

Bug Fixes

  • compiler: return print data when workspace is not enabled (c72ad16)
  • core: set default cmd and ignore files prefix with _ (fe9f781)
  • docs: update typos and modify terms (ee51225)
  • lesy: refactor scaffold templates (a2776cf)
  • lesy-plugin-sidekick: exit verison middleware gracefully (d7127f1)

Features

  • compiler: add support for workspace (add61ac)
  • core: add support to ignore files while providing dir (ff6b17f)
  • lesy: update templates for workspace support (49e2569)
  • lesy-pilot-ui: add workspace screen (70989b0)
  • lesy-plugin-pilot: support multiple projects (4b75655)

1.0.0-beta.5 (2020-06-22)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy

1.0.0-beta.4 (2020-06-21)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy

1.0.0-beta.3 (2020-06-17)

Bug Fixes

  • lesy-pilot-ui: allow optional required args (ca9952c)
  • lesy-plugin-validator: return middleware data (e462264)
  • validator: required rule not working when set to false (5f9ab1d)

1.0.0-beta.2 (2020-06-09)

Note: Version bump only for package lesy
